announcement.goals.stupid_express.amnesi: Recover memories from corpses and assume their past lives

announcement.goals.necromancer: Revive the dead to serve you

hud.stupid_express.necromancer.no_possib: One of your companions must die before you can use your ability

game.win.lovers: The couple survived until the end

announcement.goals.initiate: Eliminate your peer to become a killer
stupid_express.config.rolesSection.necro: If enabled, the Necromancer has a killer shop in addition to their ability
stupid_express.config.rolesSection.arson: If enabled, the Arsonist will not only exist as a neutral role but will also keep the game going until they are the last survivor or die
stupid_express.config.rolesSection.initi: This option specifies what role the Initiate will fall back to if their peer dies unexpectedly
stupid_express.config.modifiersSection.l: If enabled, partner information will be displayed on the screen for the lovers
If enabled, if one of the lovers is a killer, the lovers and killers win together
If enabled, and both lovers are civilians, the lovers and civilians win together, otherwise they must be eliminated for the game to end
gui.stupid_express.refugee.all_death: All refugees have died! Time rewind!
hud.stupid_express.allergist.cure_poison: You developed an immune response to this food, clearing the toxins from your body!
hud.stupid_express.allergist.no_poison: You feel fine, no signs of poisoning
hud.stupid_express.allergist.speed_boost: The allergic reaction gave you an adrenaline rush!
hud.stupid_express.allergist.death: Severe anaphylactic shock took your life...
